About Me

Welcome to Art For Heart website, where you can explore and enjoy my original paintings and drawings. I am a realist artist based in Romania, and I love to create colorful and expressive artworks that capture the beauty and emotion of life. Whether you are looking for a stunning piece of art for your home or office, or a unique gift for someone special, you will find something that suits your taste and budget here.


You can browse my portfolio by category, or check out my latest work on my instagram. You can also contact me if you have any questions, comments, or requests. I would love to hear from you. Thank you for visiting my art website, and I hope you enjoy my art as much as I enjoy making it.
